domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump Well, sir, I'm glad you don't want the US decimated by a deadly pandemic. Me neither. But muzzling "The Media" doesn't cure the virus (China already tried that). May I suggest, if it's better press you want, that you try actually leading a strong & unified response to the crisis.
